channel.description:
The new one since remlitos closed his topic o.O. -------------

Look here! Easiest way possible.[/url] - Author: `Lewk_ [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403207.0.html]How to Give Yourself a Static IP Adress [Portforwarding Help] [/url] - Author: David2

I can make one and update it every day…
[/quote]

That’s fine with me.[/quote]

So what you going to do? delete this and I make onther 1?

item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

remlitos’s topic didn’t get closed by him; it got deleted. Strange thing is that I have checked the moderation log and i cannot find an entry for the deletation therefore it seems that the topic just randomly got deleted by itself.

Normally i would close this and just restore the old topic however this seems to be of better quality so i wont.

v0x, please update this list as often as possible otherwise it will be removed.
